name: Education science
description: In the broad field of Education, Education science is the systematic study of the learning process and the theories, methods, and techniques of imparting knowledge to others. [cite: 48, 49]

name: Curriculum studies
description: A component of Education science focusing on the design, development, and implementation of educational curricula. [cite: 49]

name: Didactics
description: Part of Education science concerned with the theory and practical application of teaching and learning methods. [cite: 49]

name: Educational assessment, testing and measurement
description: This area of Education science deals with the methods and tools used to evaluate student learning and educational programme effectiveness. [cite: 49]

name: Educational evaluation and research
description: Within Education science, this involves systematic inquiry and assessment of educational programmes, policies, and outcomes. [cite: 49]

name: Paedagogical sciences
description: Encompasses the theories and principles of teaching and education, forming a core part of Education science. [cite: 49]
